The rom com that paved the way for a lot of other cliched and unrealistic movies in the genre is back for a final time.. I watched the first movie in preparation I could see why the ditziness and corkiness of this character was beloved around the world. But now Bridget Jones is in her 40 s and can they manage to pull off the same success ??. I liked this movie better than expected It provided some good laughs for me.. The main reason this was so funny was a lot of the situational humor Bridget s conflict with whose the dad ?, the battle between Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey These were the things that drove the humor in this movie. It does have downfalls though Bridget s ditziness really annoyed me in this one One of the reason s being she's too old to be doing this. Better than expected The guys were charming and the music make this third installment not too fatigued.
